title: Video upload success
description: Verify that a user can successfully select and upload a valid video file and start the analysis process.

steps.description: Navigate to the Upload Page
Select a valid video file (supported format and size)
Click 'Start Analysis' button
Check that upload starts and progresses without error
Verify redirection to Video Player page with selected video loaded

title: Video upload failure with invalid file
description: Verify system handles unsupported file types or corrupted files gracefully during upload.

steps.description: Navigate to the Upload Page
Select an invalid or unsupported video file
Click 'Start Analysis' button
Verify that error message is displayed for unsupported file
Verify upload is blocked and user remains on upload page

title: Video player playback controls functionality
description: Verify that the advanced video player supports play, pause, seek, volume, and fullscreen operations on uploaded videos.

steps.description: Navigate to Video Player page with a loaded video
Click play button and verify video plays
Click pause button and verify video pauses
Use timeline slider to seek to different timestamps
Verify video jumps to corresponding timestamps correctly
Adjust volume control and verify audio volume changes
Volume is changed accordingly
Enter fullscreen mode via player controls
Video player switches to fullscreen and remains functional

title: AI analysis initiation and progress states
description: Verify clicking the 'Start AI Analysis' triggers the AI subtitle error detection process with upload and analyzing progress states visible.

steps.description: On Video Player page, click 'Start AI Analysis' button
Upload progress state is displayed and progresses
Upon upload completion, analysis progress state is displayed
AI analysis completes with results shown in Results Sidebar

title: Results sidebar displays AI detected errors
description: Verify AI detected subtitle errors are accurately displayed in the Results Sidebar with clickable entries that seek video timestamps.

steps.description: Complete AI analysis for a video with known subtitle errors
Verify AI detected errors are listed in the Results Sidebar with timestamp info
Click on an AI detected error card
Video player seeks to the error's timestamp accurately

title: Add and display manual timestamped comments
description: Ensure users can manually add comments linked to current video timestamps and comments appear immediately in the results list.

steps.description: Navigate to Video Player page with loaded video
Play video and pause at a desired timestamp
Enter a manual comment in the input field and submit
Comment appears instantly in Results Sidebar with correct timestamp
Click on the manual comment card
Video player seeks to the comment timestamp correctly

title: Project management CRUD operations
description: Verify users can create, rename, delete, and share projects correctly with UI updates and no errors.

steps.description: Navigate to Project Management dashboard
Create a new project with valid name
New project appears in the list
Rename the created project
Project shows updated name
Share the project and verify sharing options
Project sharing succeeds and updated sharing status shows
Delete the project
Project is removed from the list without errors

title: Global project search functionality
description: Validate that the global search reliably returns relevant project results matching search queries.

steps.description: Open global search dialog
Enter a search term matching existing project names
Search results display relevant projects containing the search term
Enter a search term with no matching projects
Search results indicate no matches found without errors

title: Team management role and permission modifications
description: Ensure team member roles and permissions can be updated and persist correctly.

steps.description: Navigate to Team Management page
Select a team member and change their role
Role update succeeds and changes persist after page reload
Adjust permissions for a team member (if applicable)
Permissions update correctly and persist

title: Notification center read/unread state handling
description: Verify that notifications correctly display read and unread states, and state changes persist when notifications are marked read.

steps.description: Navigate to Notification Center page
Unread notifications are visually distinct from read notifications
Mark an unread notification as read
Notification read state updates visually and persists after page reload

title: User settings changes persist and reflect correctly
description: Verify that modifications to profile, notification preferences, appearance, and security settings are saved and correctly applied.

steps.description: Navigate to User Settings page
Change profile details (e.g., display name, email)
Modify notification preferences and appearance settings
Change security settings such as password
Save all changes
Confirm all changes persist and UI reflects them after page reload

title: Storage usage overview accuracy
description: Validate that storage overview page shows accurate usage data, categories, and recent files updates appropriately with file operations.

steps.description: Navigate to Storage Management page
Storage usage and file categories display accurate values matching backend data
Upload a new video file
Storage usage updates accordingly and new file is listed in recent files
Delete a file
Storage usage decreases and deleted file is removed from recent files

title: Error handling for AI analysis failures
description: Test how the system handles and displays errors during AI subtitle analysis, such as API failures or network issues.

steps.description: Trigger AI analysis with simulated API failure or network interruption
Verify that a clear error message is displayed to the user
Ensure the UI allows retrying the analysis without crashing or freezing

title: Manual comment input validation and limits
description: Verify input validation for manual comments including empty input, max length, and special characters handling.

steps.description: Attempt to submit an empty comment
Submission is blocked and an appropriate validation error is shown
Enter a comment exceeding max allowed length
Submission is blocked or truncated with an appropriate message
Add a comment containing special characters or emojis
Comment is accepted and displayed correctly without UI breakage

title: Navigation components usability and accessibility
description: Verify sidebar, top bar, and project navigation components render correctly, are accessible via keyboard, and facilitate smooth navigation.

steps.description: Load application and verify sidebar and top bar render
Use keyboard navigation to access sidebar and open project list
Focus states and ARIA attributes are present and usable
Click on links to navigate between projects and main pages
Navigation occurs without errors and UI updates accordingly
